title: New Zealand Based Group Looking for More
body:
As the title states,

Looking for a few more New Zealand based League players to help fill out a team. No minimum rank required. If interested all coaching and training will be provided. 

Post below if interested and i will contact you for a chat :)

Must have:

* At least 3 free nights a week
* A can do attitude
* A tilt proof attitude

replies.body:
I'd be keen. Gold IV supp main, but I fill. Always down to voicechat too :)  
  
IGN: LNKY  
  
hmu

supp main, can play mid and adc to some extent. Bad jungler. Will probably end up unintentionally feeding in top lane.
bronze one piece of shit who tries their best.
hasn't been ranked in flex.
plays at least in the afternoon n.z time. 
not overly tilt proof, so i might need to quit pretty early on and play a different game. 
has a relatively small champion pool. isn't very aggressive either.

supp main
good italian boy 
nice english accent 
silver 3 ex-silver 1 before changing server 

really want to play team ranked games ^-^

Hey mate, 

Silver 2 atm, and I play mid lane.

Thanks,
dangerrlad

Hey Crunchy,

I am an active player and I would be happy to join your team.

Regards,
Pohps

> No minimum rank required

Even a pathetic, skill-less Bronze V no-life such as myself?
